column1: Daqingshan County (Chinese: 大箐山县; pinyin: Dàqìngshān xiàn) is a county in Heilongjiang Province
column2: China. It is under the administration of the prefecture-level city of Yichun. The county was established by merging the former Dailing District (带岭区) and Langxiang Town (朗乡镇) of Tieli City approved by Chinese State Council in 2019. The county seat is Dailing Subdistrict (带岭街道).

column1: Dajingshan is divided into only one subdistrict
column3: and has jurisdiction over 10 forestry units (林场) and two natural protection areas (自然保护区).
